transcript:
Customer: Har Har Mahadev Shiv Shambhu Bholenath ki kripa aap par bani rahe bas thoda intezar kare Ashutosh jald hi aapki call ka jawab denge.

Hello?
Executive: Haan boliye.
Customer: Aashutosh sir baat kar rahe hain?
Executive: Boliye.
Customer: Sir aap IndiaMART ke services vagaira fir wapas se use nahi kar rahe hain abhi aapka relevance validity ka problem solve nahi hua?
Customer: Madam usko band kar dijiye koi matlab nahi hai iska.
Executive: Kyun sir?
Customer: Mere paas na to mere paas itna time hai ki main iske liye faltu time deta hun.
Customer: Aur dusra na to iske upar buyleads aate hain.
Customer: Faltu mein maine dobara se le liya galti mujhse ho gayi.
Customer: Aap log jhanse mein de kar ke sara business karte hain koi fayda nahi iska.
Executive: Kya cheez sir?
Customer: Aap log jo bhi baat karte hain na wo true hota nahi.
Customer: Koi buyleads nahi aati hai kuch bhi nahi hota hai bar bar request karke aap logon ko subscription dilana hota hai subscription dilane ke baad sab gayab.
Executive: Sir koi gayab to koi nahi hota na aapko connect to har mahine kiya jata hai aur aisa bhi nahi hai ki aapke problem sun ke koi kaam nahi kiya jata hai.
Customer: Main aapko har mahine call karun aur aap log ye bol do ki haan sir ye main kara deti hun aise ho jayega.
Customer: Thik hai kuch corrections kar dungi.
Customer: To aapne to call karke apna kaam nipta liya samne wala ek mahine tak aapko dobara call connect karega ya to fir aapko aapke piche piche bar bar call karega.
Executive: Sir ye nahi bola gaya hai ki piche piche bhagna agar aapko uske baad dekho aap se bola ki kaam kar denge thik hai humko jo required changes lag rahe the humne wo apni taraf se kare uske baad bhi agar aapko problem ho rahi thi to aapko bhi connect karna chahiye na ek bar.
Customer: Kaun bol rahi hai?
Executive: Sir account manager baat kar rahi hun Mansi account manager meri account manager bol rahi hain.
Customer: Ji ji.
Customer: Kya naam hai aapka?
Executive: Mansi.
Customer: Mansi ji Mansi ji meri aapki baat ho gayi hogi.
Executive: Kya cheez sir?
Customer: 10 times se meri baat hui aapke na online bhi maine meeting kiya aapke haan sara kuch.
Executive: Haan haan.
Customer: Aap piche ki aur ki baat to nahi hoti hai.
Executive: Nahi nahi mere filhal jab haan jab renewal aapne humse nahi karaya tha renewal ke baad jo training vagaira provide karai thi uske baad se aapki mere se ye baat ho rahi hai.
Customer: Uske baad mujhe bataye ki renewal ke pehle jiska bhi call aata tha thik hai renewal ke baad aapko account manager bana diya gaya aap mujhe mujhe lagta hai 10 times se hamari baat hui hogi mujhe ek bhi buylead aayi hai aap khud judge kar lo dekh lo aap mere account manager aap mera pura account hack karke proper tarike se aap dekh lo agar kahin se kuch buylead mil rahi ho main apna time bhi deta hun uske bavjud nahi milta to main irritate nahi hunga to kya karunga.
Executive: Sir I know ki aap irritate ho gaye acha aap koi mere ko aisa account matlab suggest kar sakte ho ki jo aapke hi usme deal karte ho jo aapko lag raha ho inka profile acha bana hua hai hum unke jaisa same kar denge kyunki dekho aisa to hai nahi ki aur kisi ko business nahi mil raha hoga IndiaMART se aapko bhi itni knowledge hai ki aapke jaise matlab kai log aur bhi hain aap mujhe suggest kar do ek aisa account jo aapko lagta ho aapke same products mein wo deal karte hain.
Customer: Genuine Medica Private Limited.
Executive: Ek second rukhiyega sir zara.
Executive: Daal rahi hun wait.
Executive: Haan ab ab naam bataiye kya bataya?
Customer: G E N U I N E Genuine M E D I C A Medica P V T L T D.


Executive: Ye UP ke hi rehne wale hain sir?
Customer: Delhi.
Executive: Delhi.

Executive: Sir ye IndiaMART pe available hai kyunki inke jaise kai accounts aa rahe hain na aur ye Delhi mein hi hai wo available.
Executive: Ek bar aap ya to spelling cross check kar do.
Customer: G E N U I N E
Executive: Ek second ek second aaram se sir G E N
Customer: U I N E
Executive: Haan.

Executive: Aage kya hoga?
Customer: Genuine Medica Private Limited.
Executive: Okay Medica.



Executive: Haan mil gaya thik hai inke jitne bhi products hain wo sare aapke same hi hain similar hain.
Customer: Similar hai match karte hain.
Executive: Okay. Rate same hi hai na.
Executive: Dekho rate jo hai wo hum aapke wale hi rakh denge thik hai aur baki cheeze jo hain wo hum inke jaise kar dete hain uske liye aap mere ko do do din approx ka samay do aur main usko karwa deti hun waisa hi jaisa aap chahte ho.
Customer: Haan sir samajh gayi main ki aapko ek bhi leads vagaira nahi mili aur agar main inke jaisa hi catalog karwa dungi to aapka matlab.
Customer: Iske pehle bhi mere sath aisa hi hua hai uske baad bhi maine ek saal dedh saal ke baad dobara se liya package to bar bar sara tha to mujhe laga thik hai chalo ho sakta hai kuch upgradation hua hoga.
Executive: Haan haan.
Customer: Abhi tarike se bhi wahi hai.
Executive: Aap isko pata hai aapka experience kharab laga hai and hua hai aapko otherwise mat lijiyega mam lekin mujhe mujhe aise log cheater hi lagte hain main kya bolun.
Customer: Hai sir isme.
Customer: Market mein bahut si companies hain hai na bahut si companies hain they are doing B to B businesses aur wo bhi yahi kaam kar rahi hain aisa nahi ki aapse alag kar rahi hain.
Customer: Trade India hai IndiaMART aapka khud ka hai aur jaise pata nahi kitni companies hain.
Executive: Haan sir samajh gayi.
Customer: Ek hi buyleads ko 50 logon ko bechna hai.
Executive: Haan mein haan milana hai kya bolun main.
Customer: Chalo aap dekh sakte hain sir ye thik hai.
Executive: Aur sir ek kaam kar lo aap ye batao ye wali jo aayi hai endoscope waterproof camera isme karte hain aap?
Customer: Nahi.
Executive: Isme nahi karte hain?
Customer: Endoscope waterproof camera to hota hi hai.
Customer: Wo to karte hi hain medical equipment mein koi bhi hoga sare camera karte hain isme likha hai USB 7M.
Customer: Nahi nahi.
Executive: Isme nahi karte hain?
Executive: Sir main ek do lead dekho ek to thoda bahut change karti hun main aapko ek do leads vagaira bhejti hun thik hai to usko at least consume karo baki mere ko ye man ke chalo do din to lagenge kyunki ek dam same sari cheeze change karni padengi na to ye man ke chalo aap Tuesday tak ye cheeze ho jayenge uske baad main fir aapko call back karungi to aap ek bar cross check kar lena.
Customer: Thik hai okay sir okay.

Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer not getting buyleads. Wants refund.

- Feels IndiaMART is a fraud.

- Dissatisfied with IndiaMART services.



Resolution:

- Executive suggested a similar account.

- Executive assured to resolve the issue by Tuesday.

- Executive will send leads to the customer.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back on Tuesday.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, refund, subscription, account manager
